properties.areaDesc: Michigan Waters of Lake Erie from Detroit River to North Cape MI
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 17 at 10:18AM EST until January 19 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Detroit/Pontiac MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...During the Gale Warning, expect sustained winds up to 26
knots from the west with gusts up to 38 knots. The largest
significant waves will be 4 feet with a potential maximum wave
height of 5 feet.

* WHERE...Michigan Waters of Lake Erie from Detroit River to
North Cape MI.

* WHEN...The maximum winds are expected around 9 PM EST Saturday
with the largest waves expected around 4 PM EST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous waves which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM SATURDAY TO 4 AM EST SUNDAY
